isis.stitle: STEERABLE DRIVE AXLE END UNIT: FABCO - CLEAN AND INSPECT - INSPECTION

svcproc.title: INSPECTION
svcproc.para: Prior to reassembly, parts which are to be reused must be carefully inspected for signs of wear or damage.

All bearing and bushing surfaces including roller bearing cups and cones should be examined for pitting, wear, or overheating. Check shafts for nicks, bends or damaged threads. Inspect all structural members and welds closely for any signs of cracking. Parts which show any sign of damage or excessive wear should be repaired or replaced.
